summary: Adds 2 books - Quest Knowledge, v1 and Quest Knowledge, v2 which should cover all quests, stages & objectives for all vanilla quests
descriptionHtml:
This little mod was taken on to see if it would be possible to break down 300+ quests, including stages & objectives into useable in-game guide books.

Quest Knowledge volume 1 has a list of quest names, stages & objectives for Bard\'s College, Bounty, Companions, Civil War, Daedric, Winterhold College, Dark Brotherhood & Thieves Guild quests. 
Volume 2 has all remaining vanilla quests.

Both books should be added to player inventory upon start and you should get a message to that effect. If you need to add the book(s) via console  ~help knowledge for the item code(s)

Optional file download here for Quest Spreadsheet - If you like Alt+Tab ing out of your game ;)


Installation/uninstall - *please delete any old version before installing the new one*

Use Nexus Mod Manager
            or
Extract BookOfKnowledge.esp & BookOfKnowledge.bsa to your Skyrim\\Data directory (*v1)
Extract questknowledge.esp & questnowledge.bsa to your Skyrim\\Data directory (*v2)
Make sure to activate the plugin by checking the box in your data files
Uninstall by deleting these two files

File checked for errors/conflicts using TES5Edit 3.0.26 before uploading

If you run in to any issues/bugs please leave a comment letting me know so I can try to fix it
author: scrapperrm

files.name: Quest Knowledge v2-1
files.changelogHtml:
added 2nd book to the set!
changed startup script to place both volumes in player inventory
